name: @pickledeggs123/globular-marauders-generator
description: A command line tool used to generate meshes for the globular-marauders resume video game

scripts.run-mesh-planet: npm run build && node dist/index.js mesh planet output.mesh
scripts.run-image-planet: npm run build && node dist/index.js image planet output.mesh
scripts.run-embed-image-into-mesh-planet: npm run build && node dist/index.js embed planet output.mesh
scripts.run-mesh-planet-gltf: npm run build && node dist/index.js mesh-gltf planet output.mesh.glb

author: PickledEggs123
